subject: Public Speaking
title: The Picture Superiority Effect
description: A fast breakdown of The Picture Superiority Effect for builders.

hook.text: People recall images 6x better than words alone.

buildup.text: Visual metaphors stick. Paint mental pictures with your words.

discovery.text: Describe scenes, not concepts. Her hands trembled beats she was nervous.

twist.text: Speeches with vivid imagery are remembered longer.

climax.text: Your words should create movies in the listener's mind.

punchline.text: Paint pictures with words. They remember images.

quiz.question: Why are images memorable?
options: Brain processes and stores images better
